# 
		Journal of Casting & Materials Engineering
					

URL: https://www.wydawnictwo.agh.edu.pl/strona/569-journal-casting-materials-engineering
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:40

About the Journal

The JOURNAL OF CASTING & MATERIALS ENGINEERING (JCME)
 is a peer-reviewed, academic 
e-periodical
 devoted to issues in engineering processes and casting materials. The periodical is published as a quarterly in the open access system by the AGH University of Science and Technology in Kraków. The JCME publishes original research articles, as well as reviews and theoretical articles. The mission of the periodical is to contribute to the development of knowledge and new scientific ideas in the field of engineering processes and casting materials.

				Current Issue
